General.Name: Zhejiang Youpon Integrated Ceiling Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Youpon Integrated Ceiling Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells integrated ceilings in China. The company offers bathroom, living room, kitchen, bedroom, dining room, and other house space ceilings. It also designs and develops warm cube bathroom heating and air conditioners, cold cube kitchen air conditioners, drying cube balcony clothes dryers, background walls, integrated balconies, etc. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Haiyan, China.

2.Name: Mr. Wei Jiang  Wu
2.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board of Directors & Director
